Compatible (Tested) with iOS 9.2 and till 11.3.1.

PhoneForceOpenTabs Gives the Opportunity to Force the Phone Application to Always Open the Chosen Tabs by Default!

See Screenshot below.

No Respring Needed for enabling and disabling the Tweak options: just wait for a few seconds to see the Changes!

Configure options from Settings.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!
